AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  07 /  2012 
 
 
Subject :   Permission for access of vehicle up to the aircraft  to His  
                  Holiness Jagadguru Dr.Balagangadharanatha Mahaswamiji and  
                  using of VIP lounge on medical grounds at  airports in the  
                  country.  
 
 
 
        
Please refer to this Bureau  AVSEC Circular No.06/2011 dated 
01/02/2011 on the subject cited above.  
 
      
His Holiness Jagadguru Dr.Balagangadharanatha Mahaswamiji is 
hereby permitted to avail the access of his personal vehicle upto the tarmac, on 
medical grounds during his departure / arrival by air at all airports in the country, 
for a further  period of one year beyond  12/01/2012. 
 
                 This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
